extractor.prompt:
You are a signal extractor. Your job is to identify concrete, verifiable claims from the input.
Do NOT interpret or analyze. Just extract.

INPUTS:
SOURCE: What is Identity Dark Matter?
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/what-is-identity-dark-matter.html
CONTENT: The Invisible Half of the Identity Universe Identity used to live in one place - an LDAP directory, an HR system, a single IAM portal. Not anymore. Today, identity is fragmented across SaaS, on-prem, IaaS, PaaS, home-grown, and sha...
extractor.raw_response:
CLAIM: Identity is fragmented across SaaS, on-prem, IaaS, PaaS, home-grown, and shadow applications. | SOURCE: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/what-is-identity-dark-matter.html | CONFIDENCE: high  
CLAIM: A campaign dubbed PHALT#BLYX uses fake BSoD pages to deliver DCRat. | SOURCE: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/fake-booking-emails-redirect-hotel.html | CONFIDENCE: high  
CLAIM: TOTOLINK EX200 has a flaw allowing remote authenticated attackers to gain full device control. | SOURCE: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/unpatched-firmware-flaw-exposes.html | CONFIDENCE: high  
CLAIM: Two Chrome extensions exfiltrate ChatGPT and DeepSeek chats from 900,000 users. | SOURCE: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/two-chrome-extensions-caught-stealing.html | CONFIDENCE: high  
CLAIM: CVE-2026-0625 (RCE) in D-Link DSL routers is being actively exploited. | SOURCE: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/active-exploitation-hits-legacy-d-link.html | CONFIDENCE: high  

SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: down | MAGNITUDE: 9  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: down | MAGNITUDE: 8  
SIGNAL: Market | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 5  
SIGNAL: Market | DIRECTION: down | MAGNITUDE: 5  
SIGNAL: Market | DIRECTION: neutral | MAGNITUDE: 7

claims.text: Identity is fragmented across SaaS, on-prem, IaaS, PaaS, home-grown, and shadow applications.
A campaign dubbed PHALT#BLYX uses fake BSoD pages to deliver DCRat.
TOTOLINK EX200 has a flaw allowing remote authenticated attackers to gain full device control.
Two Chrome extensions exfiltrate ChatGPT and DeepSeek chats from 900,000 users.
CVE-2026-0625 (RCE) in D-Link DSL routers is being actively exploited.

skeptic.prompt:
You are a professional skeptic. Your job is to find what could be wrong.
For EVERY apparent consensus or trend, you MUST provide a counterargument.

INPUTS:
SOURCE: What is Identity Dark Matter?
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/what-is-identity-dark-matter.html
CONTENT: The Invisible Half of the Identity Universe Identity used to live in one place - an LDAP directory, an HR system, a single IAM portal. Not anymore. Today, identity is fragmented across SaaS, on-prem, IaaS, PaaS, home-grown...

analyst.prompt:
You analyze downstream effects. For each development, ask: "If this continues, what breaks?"

INPUTS:
SOURCE: What is Identity Dark Matter?
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/what-is-identity-dark-matter.html
CONTENT: The Invisible Half of the Identity Universe Identity used to live in one place - an LDAP directory, an HR system, a single IAM portal. Not anymore. Today, identity is fragmented across SaaS, on-prem, IaaS, PaaS, home-grown, and shadow applications. Each of these environments c...
analyst.raw_response:
EFFECT: Identity Sprawl Compromises Zero Trust Frameworks | TRIGGER: Fragmented identity management across SaaS/on-prem systems | TIMELINE: Months  
COMPOUND: Amplifies risks from unpatched firmware flaws (TOTOLINK EX200) and RCE vulnerabilities (Veeam/n8n) by creating unmonitored access vectors | SEVERITY: HIGH  

EFFECT: Phishing-as-a-Service Exploits Misconfigured Email Routing | TRIGGER: D-Link RCE vulnerability enabling attacker-controlled DNS | TIMELINE: Weeks  
COMPOUND: Combines with fake booking email campaigns (PHALT#BLYX) to weaponize internal domain spoofing for multi-stage attacks | SEVERITY: HIGH  

EFFECT: AI-Powered Zero Trust Blind Spots | TRIGGER: Rise of Non-Human Identities (NHIs) in automation | TIMELINE: Years  
COMPOUND: Undermines AI-driven security tools that rely on traditional file/indicator-based detection, enabling stealthy botnet activity | SEVERITY: HIGH  

EFFECT: RCE Vulnerability Cascades in Backup Ecosystems | TRIGGER: Unpatched Veeam/n8n flaws | TIMELINE: Weeks  
COMPOUND: Exploits backup systems to exfiltrate encrypted data, compounding with Chrome extension data theft to create cross-platform breaches | SEVERITY: HIGH  

EFFECT: Critical Infrastructure Botnet Formation | TRIGGER: TOTOLINK EX200 firmware flaw + D-Link RCE | TIMELINE: Weeks  
COMPOUND: Enables mass device takeover for DDoS attacks, leveraging compromised IoT devices to amplify phishing and ransomware campaigns | SEVERITY: HIGH

effects.text: Identity Sprawl Compromises Zero Trust Frameworks
effects.trigger: Fragmented identity management across SaaS/on-prem systems
D-Link RCE vulnerability enabling attacker-controlled DNS
Rise of Non-Human Identities (NHIs) in automation

effects.text: RCE Vulnerability Cascades in Backup Ecosystems

effects.trigger: TOTOLINK EX200 firmware flaw + D-Link RCE

forecaster.prompt:
Convert uncertainty into probability. Every forecast must be:
- Binary (yes/no outcome)
- Time-bound (specific resolution date)
- Falsifiable (clear criteria)

INPUTS:
SOURCE: What is Identity Dark Matter?
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/what-is-identity-dark-matter.html
CONTENT: The Invisible Half of the Identity Universe Identity used to live in one place - an LDAP directory, an HR system, a single IAM portal. Not anymore. Today, identity is fragmented across SaaS, on-prem, IaaS, PaaS,...
forecaster.raw_response:
FORECAST: Will Veeam release a patch for CVE-2025-59470 by 2026-04-30? | PROB: 0.90 | DATE: 2026-04-30 | CRITERIA: Patch available on Veeam's official support portal or CVE database.  
FORECAST: Will n8n announce a patch for CVE-2026-21877 by 2026-06-30? | PROB: 0.80 | DATE: 2026-06-30 | CRITERIA: Official patch release on n8n's website or CVE database.  
FORECAST: Will D-Link release a patch for CVE-2026-0625 by 2026-05-31? | PROB: 0.75 | DATE: 2026-05-31 | CRITERIA: Patch available on D-Link's support portal or CVE database.  
FORECAST: Will Chrome Web Store remove the malicious extensions by 2026-02-28? | PROB: 0.70 | DATE: 2026-02-28 | CRITERIA: Extensions removed from Chrome Web Store and listed as malicious.  
FORECAST: Will TOTOLINK release a patch for CVE-2025-65606 by 2026-03-31? | PROB: 0.85 | DATE: 2026-03-31 | CRITERIA: Patch available on TOTOLINK's support portal or CVE database.
